title: Quote of the Week on the great fire of 1532
post: See previous posting re “David Rolfe – We need you” where Hugh has now provided a reference to a Dallas 2005 paper by Guerreschi & Salcito re Scorches and watermarks: http://www.shroud.com/pdfs/aldo4.pdf  a most intriguing paper, and also the dicussion anoxie / hugh.
author: daveb of wellington nz
